title: Tracy Brabin – 2020 Comments on the Film and TV Production Restart Scheme
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Tracy Brabin, the Shadow Minister for the Cultural Industries, on 16 October 2020.
content: This is good news for screen productions large and small, but it should not have taken so long and we’re concerned the delay has led to people leaving the industry.
The Government should also do more to help other areas of our creative industries that simply cannot get back to work, and freelancers who have been locked out of meaningful support for months.
